mapper.sql: select r.account_no,r.failed_num,r.blacklist_num,a.merchant_id,r.mobile, date_format(r.create_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_datetime, date_format(r.resp_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') resp_datetime, r.send_status,r.content, r.reservation_datetime, case WHEN r.send_status = 100 THEN '待处理' WHEN r.send_status = 200 THEN '提交成功' WHEN r.send_status = 300 THEN '失败' WHEN r.send_status = 400 THEN '已冲正' WHEN r.send_status = 500 THEN '发送成功' ELSE '' end send_status_des, r.send_msg, r.province, r.city, r.isp, r.merc_req_time, concat(r.sum_num,'/',r.success_num) sum_success from s_plain_send_record r inner join s_merchant_account a on a.account_no = r.account_no
